text: Takheun di kamoe iman keu Tuhan Deungon phireuman lam kitab Allah Peue nyang geupeutron keunoe bak kamoe Dilee nibak nyoe bak Nabiyullah Nabi Ibrahim Nabi Ismail Ishak lagi Yaâ€˜qob pih sudah Ngon aneuk cuco ureueng nyan teuma Musa ngon Isa pih lom meutamah Lom nyang geupeutron bak Nabi-nabi Nyang laen lagi peurintah Allah Bandum ureueng nyan hana meubeda Kitab nyang sama tren nibak Allah Kamoe peujok droe bandum bak Tuhan Tamong Iseulam hana meuubah
